name: Ninja Jump (itch) (leoniveygames)
description:
Ninja Jump is a mini game which will be playable in High School Hills:

https://www.instagram.com/leoniveygames/

Controls:

Move: A, D  = Left and Right

Jump: W, Space = to Jump 

play this game in full screen mode :)

Please leave feedback, if you feel the game could be improved in anyway!

Thank you!
